leukapp.apps.workflows.validators module¶

workflows validators.

Please refer to Django’s validation documentation to learn more and follow best practices.

projects_string_validator(projects_string)[source]¶

Validates that the projects_string has the correct format.

technology_type_validator(analyte, sequencing_technology, technology_type)[source]¶

Validates the analyte/technology/technology_type combination.

Parameters:
  • analyte (str) – ANALYTE
  • sequencing_technology (str) – SEQUENCING_TECHNOLOGY
  • technology_type (str) – TECHNOLOGY_TYPE
